title: Claude could search the web for this
detail: Claude's knowledge has a cutoff date, but it can search the web for current information. For recent news, live data, or anything that changes over time, asking Claude to search gets you fresher, more accurate results than relying on training data alone.
surface_triggers: User asks about current events or recent information. User wants information that might have changed recently. User asks about something Claude might not have trained on. Question involves real-time data like prices, news, or status.
